paper_abstract: In this correspondence, we present a family of binary 2(n) sequences of period 2(2(n) - 1) where n is an integer, which can be seen as a generalization of nonlinear binary sequences obtained from Z(4) sequences and recently constructed GKW (Gold, Kasami, and Welch)-like sequences. The sequences have low correlations and are useful in code-division multiple-access (CDMA) communication systems and cryptography.
